headline.main: Dr. Leo Srole, Director of Surveys On Urbanites' Mental Health, 84

docs.lead_paragraph: Leo Srole, a sociologist who directed landmark studies on the mental health of urban Americans, died on Saturday at his home in Queens. He was 84. The cause was a heart attack, his family said.
docs.snippet: Leo Srole, a sociologist who directed landmark studies on the mental health of urban Americans, died on Saturday at his home in Queens. He was 84.   The cause was a heart attack, his family said.
